name: zonally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving or relating to zones (= areas that are different in some way to the ones around them): The Paraguayan team knows how to play zonally, with one player supporting another and nobody playing on his own. zonally classified rates of rainfall See
zonal
More examplesFewer examplesDistribution by factories has been done zonally, that is factories have distributed to markets near the factory only.One chapter covers the zonally asymmetric climatology of the tropics.There is no sharp distinction between the random and the zonally arranged cavities.
